java.lang.Object
  com.google.code.sagetvaddons.sjq.shared.Task
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
QueuedTask
public class Task
extends Object
implements Serializable

A Task represents a unit of work to be performed

$Id$
Author:
dbattams

Constructor Detail

Task

public Task()
Default constructor; set state to default values

Task

public Task(String id,
            int requiredResources,
            int maxInstances,
            String schedule,
            String executable,
            String exeArguments,
            long maxTime,
            float maxTimeRatio,
            int minReturnCode,
            int maxReturnCode,
            String testExe,
            String testArgs)
Constructor

Parameters:
id - The task id
requiredResources - The number of resources required to run this task
maxInstances - The max instances of this task that can run in parallel
schedule - The task ENABLED schedule; crontab format
executable - The exe path; relative paths are relative to the base install dir of task client
exeArguments - The command line args for the exe
maxTime - The maximum number of seconds to run this task
maxTimeRatio - Not implemented; just pass 1.0
minReturnCode - The min successful return code for the exe
maxReturnCode - The max successful return code for the exe
testExe - The path of the pretest script to execute or null if one shouldn't be run
testArgs - Test args to pass to the pretest script
